title: Add app logo to Global ZGEY application

requirements.summary: Display the Global ZGEY app logo in the Layout header component, replacing or complementing the existing branding
acceptanceCriteria: The app logo image is visible in the Layout header
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and sizing for header display
Logo is loaded from the generated assets directory as a static asset
Logo displays correctly on both light and dark themes

file_operations.description: Import and display the Global ZGEY app logo (frontend/public/assets/generated/global-zgey-logo.dim_512x512.png) in the header component. Replace or complement the existing 'Global Connect' text branding with the logo image. Ensure the logo has appropriate sizing (height and width constraints) and maintains aspect ratio. Apply CSS classes that ensure the logo displays correctly in both light and dark themes. Position the logo in the header's branding area, typically on the left side before the navigation links.

requirements.summary: Add the Global ZGEY logo to the HTML document head as a favicon for browser tab display
acceptanceCriteria: Favicon appears in browser tabs when the application is open
Favicon uses appropriate size (16x16 or 32x32 pixels)
Favicon is linked correctly in frontend/index.html

file_operations.description: Add a <link> element in the <head> section to reference the Global ZGEY favicon (frontend/public/assets/generated/global-zgey-favicon.dim_32x32.png) as the page favicon. Use rel='icon' with type='image/png' and the correct href path to the generated favicon asset. Ensure the href path is relative to the frontend public directory (e.g., '/assets/generated/global-zgey-favicon.dim_32x32.png').
